name: bitbucket-teams-webhook
description: Bitbucket Teams Webhook Lambda function - Node.js migration

scripts.build-lambda-quick: npm run build && npm run test -- --coverage && mkdir -p lambda_build && cp -r dist/* lambda_build/ && cd lambda_build && npm install --production --no-save && cd .. && cd lambda_build && zip -r ../lambda_function.zip . -x '*.git*' '*.DS_Store' 'node_modules/.bin/*' && cd ..
